name: functions
description: Yoda Speak on Firebase using Doppler for app config and secrets manaagement

scripts.configure: firebase functions:config:unset doppler && firebase functions:config:set doppler="$(doppler secrets download --no-file --silent)"
scripts.deploy: npm run configure && firebase deploy --only functions
scripts.test-api-local: curl --silent -X 'POST' 'http://localhost:5001/yodaspeak/us-central1/app/translate' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8' --data-urlencode 'text=Secrets must not be stored in git repositories'
scripts.test-api-production: curl --silent -X 'POST' 'https://us-central1-yodaspeak.cloudfunctions.net/app/translate' -H 'Content-Type: application/x-www-form-urlencoded; charset=utf-8' --data-urlencode 'text=Secrets must not be stored in git repositories'
